r.s: This package provides the database interactions for a UC Berkeley Calendar system.
r.d: This package creates and upgrades a relational database used to store event publishing details formatted using the University of California Berkeley Calendar Network schema. The backend provides basic functions for an event management frontend, as well as a public frontend.
r.n: Database changes - add primary keys to all event_has_* tables. Enable sponsors for events, including some re-arrangement of event formbuilder tags. Additional coding standards improvements.
